name: Prague GastroJazz Open 2026
description: Three-day city festival combining live jazz and curated culinary experiences.

tickets.name: Basic Day Pass
tickets.description: Access to all music stages for one selected day.

tickets.name: Gastro Weekend Pass
tickets.description: Full festival access plus five tasting tokens.

tickets.name: VIP Weekend Pass
tickets.description: Priority seating, backstage lounge, and chef meet-and-greet.
